name: Salad Showdown
description:
In Salad Showdown, you must defend an old-west town from fruit outlaws by building new houses to recruit vegetable cowboys. There are twelve rounds, and if your cornucopia is destroyed, you lose! Good luck, partner!

Salad Showdown is a style-pastiche of flash-era tower defense browser games, made in under a month for a ~four week "long-jam". Made in vanilla java with audio from freesound.

This game was made by:

Rachel Bagley

Elliott Duffy

Cole Nugteren

Isaac Tesch
